data.title: Speaker Profile: Sanjay Nadimpalli
data.meta_description: Sanjay established Tuebora with a strong conviction in the power of Machine Learning and Natural Language interfaces in IAM, aiming to slash costs, enhance organizational efficiency, bolster...
data.text:
Founder and CEO

Tuebora Inc

Sanjay established Tuebora with a strong conviction in the power of Machine Learning and Natural Language interfaces in IAM, aiming to slash costs, enhance organizational efficiency, bolster security, and eradicate administrative burdens. His passion for innovation in this realm took root during his tenure as Software Architect at Aveksa (acquired by EMC/RSA), where he co-conceptualized and delivered the industry's inaugural Access Governance solution. Over 5+ years at Aveksa, he spearheaded Product Releases. Prior to this, Sanjay held senior technical positions at Intel Corp, Webridge, and Sequent Computer Systems (acquired by IBM). Sanjay holds a Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science and Engineering from the University of Mysore and an MS in Computer Science and Engineering from the Oregon Graduate Institute of Science and Technology (OGI).
